page.title: 19ST PETER'S LODSWORTH
page.content: The Vicar showed us the newer parts of the church.{The North Transept}was the gift of the{Hollist}family just before 1840. The {South Transept }with its Norman window copied from Shoreham Church was built by the {Dennetts }in 1841 and is now a children's chapel dedicated to{St Nicholas.}We liked the bright windows. It was a very peaceful place. It was very quiet even with all of us in the nave. We said our prayers then walked around with our friends. The {St Nicholas window }in the{South {Porch}is lovely and chunky and full of colour. Outside,we walked around the tombs and gravestones. We went to the new graveyard and found {Ernest Shepard's gravestone. Mr.Shepard's pictures make{ A.A.Milne's "Winnie the Pooh" stories much more interesting. We really enjoyed our visit.
